Package service

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.Service
  • public class Service
extends Object
    Author:
    jnoukam Service class that provides methods for loading maps, handling delivery requests, computing delivery tours, and saving results in XML format.

        public Map loadMap​(String fileContent)
            throws IOException
        Loads a map from an XML string content.
        Parameters:
        fileContent - The XML content representing the map.
        Returns:
        A Map object containing the loaded intersections.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an issue during file creation or reading.

      • computeTour

        public Tour computeTour​(TourRequest tourRequest,
                        Map map)
        Computes the optimal delivery tour based on a TourRequest and Map.
        Parameters:
        tourRequest - The TourRequest containing the delivery requests.
        map - The map containing all the intersections.
        Returns:
        A Tour object representing the optimal delivery tour.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If any of the pickup or delivery points are not present in the map.

                                      throws IOException

        Parameters:
        pickupPoint - The ID of the pickup point.
        deliveryPoint - The ID of the delivery point.
        pickupDuration - The duration in seconds for pickup.
        deliveryDuration - The duration in seconds for delivery.
        Returns:
        A new DeliveryRequest object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an issue during the creation process.

        tourRequest - The TourRequest to which the delivery request will be added.

        deliveryPoint - The ID of the delivery point.
        pickupDuration - The duration in seconds for pickup.
        deliveryDuration - The duration in seconds for delivery.
        Returns:
        The updated TourRequest with the new delivery request added.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an issue during the addition process.

      • computeAndAssignTour

        public HashMap<Long,​Courier> computeAndAssignTour​(TourRequest tourRequest,
                                                        Map map,
                                                        int numCouriers)
        This method calculates and assigns tours to couriers based on delivery requests. The process involves several steps: 1. Sorts the delivery requests by proximity to the warehouse. 2. Creates a given number of couriers and initializes them with empty tour requests. 3. Assigns the sorted delivery requests to each courier in a round-robin fashion. 4. Calculates the optimal route for each courier based on the requests assigned to them. 5. Returns a map containing the couriers and their respective calculated tours.
        Parameters:
        tourRequest - The object representing the tour request, which contains information about the warehouse and delivery requests.
        map - The object representing the map used to determine proximity and calculate routes.
        numCouriers - The number of couriers to create and assign to handle the deliveries.
        Returns:
        A map where the keys are the courier IDs and the values are the Courier objects with their assigned tour.
